name: dragon-ascent
caption: Dragon Ascent

effect.short: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}, then lowers the user's [Defense]{mechanic:defense} and [Special Defense]{mechanic:special-defense} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage} each.

flavorText:
After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by
dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers
its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.
